item.title: Hong Kong December 2018 Dharma Activities
item.description: On Christmas Eve December 24, 2018, His Eminence Khöndung Asanga Vajra Rinpoche arrived in Hong Kong to a warm welcome by Venerable Ponlop Tashi Rinpoche and dharma students.

item.title: His Eminence Khöndung Asanga Vajra Rinpoche’s Teachings Schedule in Hong Kong
item.description: His Eminence Khöndung Asanga Vajra Rinpoche will briefly visit Hong Kong at the end of December, 2018.
